meaningMnemonic: You <radical>stand</radical> your <radical>towel</radical> up so everyone can see it. This announces that you are the <kanji>sovereign</kanji> ruler of this bathroom.
readingMnemonic: As the <kanji>sovereign</kanji> ruler of this bathroom, you must choose a monogram to represent your rule. For this, you choose the symbol of the food that passes through you the most: The mighty <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tot!
